title: ‘The Team Says Jump: I’ll Ask How High’: Chloé Dygert Extends with Canyon-SRAM
content:
USA's world TT champion Dygert extends for two years, fellow American Skylar Schneider takes big decision to return to Europe with SD Worx-Protime.

Read the full article at ‘The Team Says Jump: I’ll Ask How High’: Chloé Dygert Extends with Canyon-SRAM on Velo.
author: sstokes
